name: Neutral
description: As a Kitsune, most overworld hostile mobs are passive toward you.

actions.command: team remove kitsune
team add kitsune
team modify kitsune seeFriendlyInvisibles false
team join kitsune @s
execute as @s run team join kitsune @e[type=minecraft:skeleton,distance=..32]
execute as @s run team join kitsune @e[type=minecraft:spider,distance=..32]
execute as @s run team join kitsune @e[type=minecraft:cave_spider,distance=..32]
execute as @s run team join kitsune @e[type=minecraft:bee,distance=..32]

execute as @s run team join kitsune @e[type=minecraft:evoker,distance=..32]
execute as @s run team join kitsune @e[type=minecraft:pillager,distance=..32]
execute as @s run team join kitsune @e[type=minecraft:silverfish,distance=..32]
execute as @s run team join kitsune @e[type=minecraft:slime,distance=..32]
execute as @s run team join kitsune @e[type=minecraft:vex,distance=..32]
execute as @s run team join kitsune @e[type=minecraft:vindicator,distance=..32]
